compatibility.notes: MPL-1.1 allows for the combination with other licenses, but care must be taken to comply with the terms of the MPL when distributing combined works.

key_requirements: Provide attribution to the original authors.
Retain the license and copyright notices in all copies or substantial portions of the covered code.
State changes made to the original code in a prominent manner.
license.name: MPL-1.1
obligations: You must make the source code of any modifications available when distributing the modified version.
You must include a copy of the MPL license with any distribution of the covered code.
You must include a notice stating any changes made to the original code.
